attributes.action: Change The UK disabled bus pass times to 6:30AM instead of 9:30AM.
attributes.additional_details: We request to change it because It can affect people getting to work, important meetings, And emergency hospital visits on time, We think it would be easier if disabled bus cards activation times would be lowered to 6:30AM as it can make some of our lifes easier if it was lowered.
attributes.background: We request the government to change the METRO Disabled Bus Cards to 6:30AM instead of 9:30AM.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Change England’s disabled bus pass so it can be used at any time on weekdays" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729326
